content:
referential members continued

  • 3.1.4 Operations on an referential member do not affect the resource it references.

    • they are distinct
    • otherwise, security is problematic

  • 3.1.5 For any referential member of a collection, it is possible to obtain the URI of the resource it references.

    • allows client to affect target.
